name: Storm Rush
description:
#1 Racing Game in 21 countries!

Fast. Frustrating. Addictive. Unmissable.

Not recommended for iPhone 4

Storm Rush is an relentless test of speed, skill and concentration.

Easy to learn, hard to master, impossible to put down. Storm Rush places you on a never ending road that is created before your eyes.

Move left and right to avoid the glowing towers. Or Hit one and watch as the world explodes spectacularly.

Its mixture of fast paced, adrenaline fuelled game play and unique visuals makes Storm Rush a compelling experience.

In addition to the classic Storm Rush experience, Storm Rush now includes two thrilling new game modes:  Rush Mode and Arcade Mode.

In Rush Mode you are against the clock. The towers explode when you hit them, clearing the way. But watch out! Hitting the towers also slows you down. Can you reach the next check point before your time runs out?

Score as many points as you can in all new Arcade Mode! Extra points are scattered everywhere.  Collect bonuses to multiply your score, make you invincible or give you extra lives.  Keep away from those towers though!
